Translations.Text: What is with you? How do you judge
Do you not take notice
Or do you have a clear reason
Then bring your book (document), if you are truthful
And they put a relationship between Him and the Jinn, while the Jinn have certainly known that they shall be brought (to punishment)
God is flawless (and beyond) what they describe
except God's devoted servants (who are saved from punishment)
So indeed you and what you serve
you are not able to mislead any one (of God's devoted servants)
except someone who enters (and burns in) the hellfire
And (the angels say): no one is from us unless he has a known position
and we are certainly those lined up in rows
and we are certainly those who glorify (God)
And they (the disbelievers) were certainly saying
indeed if we had a reminder (or a scripture) from the earlier ones with us
we would have certainly been of God's devoted servants
And they disbelieved in it (Quran), so they will know
And Our word already went out to Our servants, the messengers
that they are certainly helped
and indeed Our troops are the winners
So turn away from them for a while
and see them, for they will see
Do they want Our punishment in a hurry
Then when it comes down to their courtyard, it is a bad morning for those who were warned
And turn away from them for a while
and see, for they will see
Your Master, the Master of power (and honor), is flawless (and He is beyond) what they describe
And peace (and well-being) upon the messengers
And all praise belongs to God, Master of humankind
